entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -44.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 60. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 37.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
